Create.DuplicateUserWarning: Please note that making multiple accounts in order to boost ratings is forbidden and will result in account termination. If you forget your password, reset it or contact a staff member.
Create.EmailNote: Your email address will not be shown to other users. Make sure you enter a valid address. You'll need it if you ever forget your password. For a profile picture you'll need an email address associated with Gravatar. Email address can be changed later.
Create.EmailTaken: This email address is already in use. If it's your address, please use the reset password function instead, or if that doesn't work, contact support.
Create.TwitterNote: Alternatively, you may sign in using your Twitter account. A Twitter account can also be connected afterwards.
Create.UsernameNote: Username needs to be at least 3 characters, and may contain only English alphabet, numbers and underscores. Password needs to be at least {{0}} characters.

Details.KnownLanguagesMessage: 본인이 사용할 수 있는 언어를 명시하십시오. 해당 정보를 "내 설정", "프로필", "내가 아는 언어" 에 입력하실 수 있습니다. 해당 정보는 연락 필요 시에 사용됩니다.
Details.PossibleProducerMessage: Are you possibly an artist (such as producer, animator or illustrator) working with Vocaloid/UTAU? If so, please see the artist verification page.

ForgotPassword.MessageSent: If the provided information matches our records, you should receive email shortly. If not, check that the username and email match, and that the account is not disabled. If the email still doesn't arrive, contact a moderator.

LoginUsingAuth.AlmostDone: 거의 다 되었습니다! VocaDB에서 사용하실 사용자명을 정해주세요.
LoginUsingAuth.AuthError: 죄송합니다, 인증 절차를 진행할 수가 없습니다. 쿠키 활성화 여부를 확인하시고 다시 시도해주시기 바랍니다.

Messages.ClickSubjectToView: Click subject to view the message.
Messages.Subject: 제목

MySettings.AccessKeyDescription:
Access key can be used to log in to your account from various other services without revealing your actual password.
				You can regenerate your access key at any time - this will invalidate the previous access key.
				Keep your access key secret! If you suspect your access key has been discovered by someone else, please reset it immediately.
MySettings.AnonymousActivity: Allow my username to be shown in the recent activity list.
MySettings.ChangePasswordNotice: You only need to fill these if you want to change your password.
MySettings.EmailNote: Not shown to other users, used by gravatar and password resets
MySettings.EmailTaken: This email address already belongs to another user. If it is your address, contact support.
MySettings.InvalidEmail: Please check the format of the email address.
MySettings.PublicAlbumCollection: Allow others to see which albums I own.
MySettings.PublicRatings: Allow everyone to see my song and album ratings.
MySettings.UnableToSave: 설정 값을 저장할 수 없습니다. 오류를 수정하시고 다시 시도하십시오.

RequestVerification.ArtistTitle: Entry of the artist whom I represent (required)
RequestVerification.NotLoggedInMessage: 죄송합니다, 이 기능을 사용하시려면 <1>로그인</1> 하시거나 <2>회원가입</2>을 하셔야합니다.
RequestVerification.URL: 증거 자료 링크 (예: 트윗 작성) (필수 항목)
